review: love it! Makes using prime and netflx  so easy. Very easy to set up!
author: Patricia P.

review: Best birthday gift I have ever bought for myself. I'm addicted to anything BBC and have so enjoyed watching every series I can find. Throwing it on the big screen has been wonderful. I highly recommend the Fire Stick to everyone who owned a Kindle
author: V. MCconnell "constant reader"

review: very happy with the ease and quality of my FIRESTICK! I love the new options available to me from the comfort of my "easy chair"
author: BRUCE

review: Works great! I love that it came ready (all I did is plug it into the HDMI slot)  to show my Amazon Prime programming.
author: R. H. Newmark "BobN"

review: What a wonderful product. Only I con sometines on certain channels the wife seizes of stops for short times causing picture/sound or both to temporarally freeze.  Amount of channels is trensndous. Setup is a snap 60 seconds. Get the Voice remote it also works fantastic and sets up in a snap. Reward yourself for $40.00 you will get almost all the channels you could want for free. Espically for PRIME members.  A true 5 STAR  Product.  Thanks Amazon.
author: quick

review: I ordered two and got one  for myself. Was not impressed. Have to pay for almost all movies. Netflix is free movies after you subscribe.I will be returning mine. The other is a gift. Pending review on that.Sincerely disappointed.Atlanta, Ga
author: Christy PHILLIPS

review: if you are using it only for prime it is great but the netflix compatibility it's awful
author: Shawn Walter

review: Have issues with Wifi dropping randomly
author: Amy
